terms.kana: にわにはにわにわとりがいる
terms.romaji: niwa niha niwa niwatori ga iru
terms.translation: There are two chickens in the garden

terms.kana: ぜんもんのとらこうもんのおおかみ
terms.romaji: zenmon no tora koumon no ookami
terms.translation: Out of the frying pan and into the fire, to escape one danger and encounter another
terms.literal translation: Tiger at the front gate, wolf at the rear gate
